org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.item

Class AbstractText

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.ReportItem
      • org.tmotte.pdfrpt.report.item.AbstractText
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PText, PTextLines

    public abstract class AbstractText
extends ReportItem
    Acts as a base class for shared functionality in PText and PTextLines. This class is mainly exposed for documentation purposes, since it is not particularly useful for the typical programmer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String REPLACE_CURR_PAGE
      Embed this String in the text of a PText or PTextLines instance and it will be replaced with the current page number.
      static java.lang.String REPLACE_PAGE_COUNT
      Embed this String in the text of a PText or PTextLines instance and it will be replaced with the total page count for the report.

    • Field Detail

      • REPLACE_PAGE_COUNT

        public static final java.lang.String REPLACE_PAGE_COUNT
        Embed this String in the text of a PText or PTextLines instance and it will be replaced with the total page count for the report. This requires the use of a PageCount object.
        See Also:
        setPageCount(PageCount), Constant Field Values

      • REPLACE_CURR_PAGE

        public static final java.lang.String REPLACE_CURR_PAGE
        Embed this String in the text of a PText or PTextLines instance and it will be replaced with the current page number. Note that this relies on an internal AbstractText counter that increments every time the instance is printed; as a result, it only works properly when the same AbstractText is placed exactly once on every page of a Report (use multiple instances to put page numbers in multiple places on a page).

        Also, REPLACE_CURR_PAGE has no effect unless a PageCount object has been assigned to this instance, even though PageCount is not relied on for this functionality; admittedly, this is strange, but it helps us avoid the need to check every instance for the use of REPLACE_CURR_PAGE.

        See Also:
        setPageCount(PageCount), Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setPageCount

        public AbstractText setPageCount(PageCount pc)
        Sets the PageCount instance for this instance. For convenience this method is overridden by both PText and PTextLines.
        See Also:
        REPLACE_PAGE_COUNT, REPLACE_CURR_PAGE
